Class SimObjectImpl.StateMachine

java.lang.Object
  simulator.simobjects.SimObjectImpl.StateMachine
Enclosing class:
SimObjectImpl
protected class SimObjectImpl.StateMachine
extends java.lang.Object

State Machine implementing the State Pattern, states are intended to be defined in the constructor as inner classes inheriting from the State class

Author:
Erick Lavoie
